name: abundantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in large quantities or amounts: The plant grows abundantly in woodland. We all ate abundantly.
extremely: You've made your feelings abundantly clear . Liam Brown is an abundantly talented writer.
More examplesFewer examplesSuch players are no longer abundantly available.The wooden panels are abundantly decorated with flowers.Earth's great urge to live is abundantly evident in the rain forest.
